text: (bright music)
- I'm Ashish Dhawan.
I'm the director for Global Partner Sales
for Enterprise Workloads.
I lead the global partner business
that helps customers migrate

their critical enterprise
workloads onto AWS.

AWS is one of the most unique
companies in the world.
It almost expects you to experiment more.

To ensure that you're not
only doing your day job,
but also thinking about the future,

thinking about what's next for
your customers and partners.
As far as the partner team is concerned,

it gives us an opportunity
to drive transformation
in our customers through the partners
they really want to work with.
It's a huge opportunity for AWS
to work on these enterprise workloads
and transform our customers to partners.
(upbeat music)
Cloud services and the adoption
of cloud services in the future
is going to happen through large

or small partner organizations
that AWS works with.
That's because our customers want to deal
with the partner of their choice.
So as a charter for AWS,

is to make sure that we
provide the right resources,
as well as have the right parts in place
for our partners to come work with us.
That's very exciting, therefore,
for anybody who's looking at joining AWS,

the partner organization is
actually front and center
in the transformation agenda.
The biggest mindset that you need
to work in AWS and in the partner org

is that you've gotta be a
builder and an innovator.
We are a company of builders.
Thinking big and experimenting

is something that we want
all our employees to do.

And that's because unless
you're thinking big,
you'll not be able to solve
the biggest problems of our customers.
